body.name: Comermax Ergonomic Executive Office Chairs with Adjustable Lumbar Support, 90-120° Rocking Managerial Chair Swivel Desk Chairs with Padded Flip-up Armrests (Pink), Medium(300lbs)
features: 【Exquisite Appearance】Different for most office chairs on the marketplace, our stylish executive chairs are specially designed with a round-shaped lumbar support, which looks so unique and chic, at the same time, can be slightly pushed up or down to fit the body curves properly. It's a nice-looking chair, ideal to be placed on both working places or casual occasions.

【Cross Legged Office Chairs】Thanks to the extra wide seat (22.44 inches) and the flip-up-arm design, this office chair can turn into a perfect cross legged chair instantly. Wouldn't it be quite enjoyable to sit on it and listen to music or watch videos on the laptop during leisure time? Dimensions of Seat Area: 22.44"(W)x19.69"(D). Seat to Floor(adjustable): 18.89-22.04". Weight Capacity: 300lbs.

【Superior Comfort】With the aim of offering chairs of maximun comfort, our team works hard at improving the seating experience of long-time work. Double padded cushion with built-in liner springs delivers better elasticity and both armrests are covered by thick soft pad to offer pleasant sense of touch. S-curved backrest adheres to spine well and offers adequate support, helping relieving physical fatigue.

【Considerate Design】To better cate for various demands at work, our high back office chair combines most popular functions required for an office chair. 1.A 90-120° rocking backrest helps relieve pessure and gain relaxation after work. 2.Flip-up armrests can be freely adjusted between 0-90°, offering better support to elbows and saving space at resting time. 3. Adjustable seat height to fit difference using habits.

【Sturdy Structure】We have reinforced the structure of the chair by using better material with stronger strength. Each office chair has a solid metal base and nylon rolling casters that move around smoothly but also keep you steady when you are working. With detailed instructions and tools included in the package, you can easily assemble the chair on your own.

【Reliable Service】Customer's satisfaction is what we care most, therefore we've been keeping improving the quality of both our items and service all the time. 1 Year warranty is offered for missing parts, shipping damage or any other non-artificial quality issues. Please feel free to let us know in the first place if you have any question.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THE CHAIR
reviews.reviewText: I pulled the chair out the box today and when I say I am beyond impressed, I mean I am BEYOND impressed! This chair was packed so well in its box. It was organized, neat and EVERY piece was wrapped for protection. I wish I had taken a picture of it in the box. The even send a small, organized tool and screw set with spare pieces just in case. The instructions were SUPER clear and the chair is so sturdy, heavy and well crafted. I say that as I am sitting in it. I LOVE this chair already. It's so soft and the green color OMG! Definitely feels like an executive chair with some modern flair. This was an amazing buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy • Wide Seat • Adjustable Lumbar
reviews.reviewText: okay let me start off by saying i was pleasantly surprised. i work from home and am beyond picky. due to a previous surgery at my tailbone and recent lower back pain due to my last chair, i needed something new. this was the second chair i purchased to try and replace my old one, and it’s a keeper. (tried a kneeling chair and it just didn’t cut it).pros: comfortable. wide seat. functional (and adjustable) lumbar. flip up armrests. gas powered height adjustment. beautiful color. smooth fabric. quick build time (and 1-person build friendly).cons: the lumbar mesh is NEON green in person & doesn’t match lol. can’t lean back. no headrest. no footrest. a little tall for me (5’3”) but i can buy a footrest.overall this is a winner for me! i’m very happy and look forward to having this chair around awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Assembly: I was able to assemble it myself in about 45 minutes. The back was a bit tricky to line up with the armrests, but had I had someone help me it would have been easier. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. The bolts are neatly packaged and there is one spare for each included, which I did not have to use as all components were present. 5/5 for ease of assembly.Quality: The wheel base, gas lift, and seat plate are all metal and sturdy. The castors are easy to install, however, they are plastic and rattle somewhat. I also find it harder to roll around in than my previous office chair. The velvet material is soft and free of rips or staining. There are no loose threads in the stitching. The rock/tilt feature is smooth and quiet. The armrests are easy to adjust and stay put. in both positions. 3.5/5 for quality; I would give it a higher rating if the castors were higher quality. They can be removed easily so I may just replace them. It is quality for the price point!Comfort: The chair is supportive and comfortable and offers decent lumbar support. The high back is tall enough to rest my head on when leaning back. The seat is wide enough to sit cross-legged, especially with the adjustable armrests. The armrests could be a bit longer toward the back, but that is just my preference. 4.5/5 for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty solid chair
reviews.reviewText: Bought an $80 “gaming” chair for my girlfriend and was not comfortable at all, shocker right? So I made up that bad purchase by getting this. It was on sale at purchase so keep that in mind. It’s a pretty solid and comfortable chair and is pretty easy to put together. If the price isn’t too bad you won’t be disappointed. Color is nice too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair. It’s comfortable to sit in all day and it looks great. It was easy to put together and is sturdy. Great quality for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars chair is comfortable but doesn't seem like it will last long
reviews.reviewText: Chair was difficult for one person to put together once it came to putting the back on and securing it to the arms. a second person would have made it much easier. chair is very nice and comfortable but I am noticing the seat isn't as supportive, the lumbar support is sagging, and the seat had a slight right to left rock to it like it is loose. I would still say it is worth the money and when I need to replace it I will likely buy the same chair again. I estimate I will need to buy a new one in the next year. So I estimate the chair to last about 18 months- 2 years and it is used M-F every week for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Easy to Build
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to assemble! I love the green color, I looked for months to find a computer chair that was both comfortable and fit my aesthetic. The cushion is nice and the seat is large enough that I can sit comfortably with room on either side (I'm 5ft6in 190lb). The circle in the chair back adjusts and the chair also can lean back a good deal, keep in mind it won't stay back if you move though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT customer service!
reviews.reviewText: Had purchased a pink chair for home and loved it so much wanted a beige one for my work office. When box arrived (just before Christmas), box was labeled as a white chair. When I contacted customer service, they responded with in 24 hours. Had to communicate back and forth a couple of times, and each time they responded quickly. (Even over Christmas holiday) They were sending me a prepaid FedEx return label, but wanted to see that chair was packed well for shipping. I had not opened the box because it said it was white. When I opened it to take picture for them, chair inside was actually beige. Packaging mistake, yes, but customer service was quick and willing to rectify what I thought was wrong chair.Also, chair is extremely sturdy and easy to assemble.
